attacks.name: Electrostep
attacks.effect: This attack does 40 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Scar Strikes
attacks.effect: If your opponent’s Active Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 100 more damage.
